title: Was this riot?
body:
I remember seeing somewhere on a forum page someone saying they were unfairly chat restricted and/or banned  ingame  - resulting in a staff member (with consent) posting the evidence of ones said actions. 

It was a hilarious turn around when the OP was put in his or her place

replies.body:
I remember one doing that to me.
Proved me right and everyone went full triggerlypuff. 
Was beautiful :')

(although, didnt say it was cool to do it)
They should devote a thread to show the dumb things people have said to be banned or chat restricted
